channel.title: Ermmm which script should I buy?
channel.description:
Hi Guys ^^ Urmmm I would like to buy a guild miner but I don't know which one of these is best so I decided to get an opinion from you guys because I'm sure that most of you are smarter than a fr00b like me xD.
I would like to buy either Sumilion's Mining Guild Smasher (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,46027.0.html) or else Mad Cow's Guild Miner (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,16174.0.html)
They both seem to be good but I just can't decide. Thnx a lot :) :D :)

item.title: Ermmm which script should I buy?
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Although I have yet to try either of those, I have tried Sumillion’s powerminer and it was pretty awesome. Plus, Sumillion can be found pretty easy on the web if you ever have any problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Ermmm which script should I buy?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Nashi:

I had Mad Cow’s Air Crafter for SS back a while ago and it was brilliant.

Yeah, I can agree.

Go with Sumilions, he’s active at SRL and he’s a good coder.

Read full topic
item.source: Ermmm which script should I buy?

item.title: Ermmm which script should I buy?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Well, You could try to buy Mad Cow’s but I think he’s either on a vacation or having a break from scripting.

And its probably not a good idea to ask/comment on whether scripts are better then others because it can hurt their feelings

I, MYSELF, Would strongly consider it but most likely choose Mad Cow’s, If he were here.
Because I’ve known him for a while and he’s pretty cool

I had Mad Cow’s Air Crafter for SS back a while ago and it was brilliant.

Read full topic
